attributes.action: Instigate a formal test of ability to speak English, a desire to become British and an understanding of the culture of the UK before Citizenship is granted and thereby allowing the right to vote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country is in the ludicrous position of allowing anyone who enters the country either legally or illegally the right to vote.

I suggest that before anyone is enfranchised, that they will be British Citizens and that citizenship should only be granted if they (the immigrant) declare that they will faithfully uphold the values of the UK and it's laws and that they have sufficient grasp of the English language, history and culture to be able to have an informed opinion of British matters before the are allowed to vote.  They must also declare a wish to become a genuine member of British Democracy.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
